title: Keystatic CMS Integration
subtitle: Headless CMS for Next.js blog content management
description:
# Keystatic CMS Integration

A modern headless CMS integration for managing blog posts and projects. Built with Keystatic and Next.js App Router.

## Features

- **Local-first storage**: Content stored as JSON files in the repository
- **Type-safe schema**: Full TypeScript support for content collections
- **Markdown support**: Rich content editing with Markdoc format
- **Collections**: Posts and Projects with customizable fields
- **Admin interface**: Web-based UI for content management

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript 5 (strict mode)
- Keystatic 0.5.48 for CMS functionality
- Tailwind CSS for styling

## Getting Started

Access the CMS at `/keystatic` route to manage content entries.
